item.title: Making of Stars of Stone
item.description: Now that the short is done, I have can finally share the years of footage and photos documenting the making-of process. Iâ€™m working on getting those into video format for youtube where you can expect a few short videos on the puppets, sets, and deleted scenes. Watch this space!
